GOD.content: sacrifice of Isaac is an abomination, it is criminal, unforgivable; today society not only participates in incalculable sacrifices (starving children, wars), it organizes it
GOD.linkedContent: sacrifice of Isaac is an abomination, it is criminal, unforgivable; today society not only participates in incalculable sacrifices (starving children, wars), it organizes it

R.content: for Aristotle, democracy: equality according to number, not worth, which makes democracy a freedom founded on equality, as opposed to being governed and govern in turn
R.linkedContent: for Aristotle, democracy: equality according to number, not worth, which makes democracy a freedom founded on equality, as opposed to being governed and govern in turn

R.content: perverse autoimmunity of democracy due to double couple: “freedom and equality” and “equality acc. #, equality acc. worth” > in the name of one couple, both couples destroyed
R.linkedContent: perverse autoimmunity of democracy due to double couple: “freedom and equality” and “equality acc. #, equality acc. worth” > in the name of one couple, both couples destroyed

R.content: democracy’s antinomy: equality introduces measure and calculation, freedom is unconditional, heterogeneous to calculation and measure > incalculable, incommensurable, unconditional equality [?]
R.linkedContent: democracy’s antinomy: equality introduces measure and calculation, freedom is unconditional, heterogeneous to calculation and measure > incalculable, incommensurable, unconditional equality [?]

R.content: technique, “technical measure of equality” is not a mishap, chance for incommensurable, technique before calculating technique [?] [POOF]
R.linkedContent: technique, “technical measure of equality” is not a mishap, chance for incommensurable, technique before calculating technique [?] [POOF]

R.content: acc. Statesmen of Plato, Politics of Aristotle, democracy, government of greatest #, is only best when laws are broken, exact reverse of Monarchy
R.linkedContent: acc. Statesmen of Plato, Politics of Aristotle, democracy, government of greatest #, is only best when laws are broken, exact reverse of Monarchy

SPOM.content: Marx feigns to count ghosts, they are innumberable, and there is but one ghost (already too many, i.e. supplements), it is # itself, the arch-specter as father as capital or Plato’s good
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx feigns to count ghosts, they are innumberable, and there is but one ghost (already too many, i.e. supplements), it is # itself, the arch-specter as father as capital or Plato’s good

SPOM.content: “arithmetical desire” finds its spur, its origin, in the fact that ghosts are innumerable
SPOM.linkedContent: “arithmetical desire” finds its spur, its origin, in the fact that ghosts are innumerable

SPOM.content: there is always more than one commodity, more than one spirit, # belongs to the movement of the commodity
SPOM.linkedContent: there is always more than one commodity, more than one spirit, # belongs to the movement of the commodity

MC.content: to speak: multiply, enumerate my chances, theme of #s in dim light of indetermination
MC.linkedContent: to speak: multiply, enumerate my chances, theme of #s in dim light of indetermination

MC.content: Derrida demonstrates the untranslatability of proper name via Pierre, has no meaning by itself, and compares this to numeral 7
MC.linkedContent: Derrida demonstrates the untranslatability of proper name via Pierre, has no meaning by itself, and compares this to numeral 7

MC.content: last chance: moment when 2 dice come to a standstill & one counts up the results > incalcuable/innumerable
MC.linkedContent: last chance: moment when 2 dice come to a standstill & one counts up the results > incalcuable/innumerable

POOF.content: count, number, calculate: acc. Aristotle, friends must be small in #, what’s small?
POOF.linkedContent: count, number, calculate: acc. Aristotle, friends must be small in #, what’s small?

POOF.content: democracy counts votes & subjects, but doesn’t/shouldn’t count ordinary singularities: no numerus clausus for arrivants
POOF.linkedContent: democracy counts votes & subjects, but doesn’t/shouldn’t count ordinary singularities: no numerus clausus for arrivants

POOF.content: small in # doesn’t characterize friends, it counts those we are speaking of, cites the exemplary, naming the rare illuminates, projects name’s renown beyond death
POOF.linkedContent: small in # doesn’t characterize friends, it counts those we are speaking of, cites the exemplary, naming the rare illuminates, projects name’s renown beyond death

POOF.content: via Aristotle, one must choose & prefer friends (election & selection), it takes time > for Aristotle, those who don’t have friends count friends among things (prágmata), possessions, the malevolent place friends in field of calculable hypothesis > yet, the choice of friends, that their # must be small, reintroduces #, calculation, into multiplicity of incalculable singularities: a certain aristocracy in arithmetic of the choice
POOF.linkedContent: via Aristotle, one must choose & prefer friends (election & selection), it takes time > for Aristotle, those who don’t have friends count friends among things (prágmata), possessions, the malevolent place friends in field of calculable hypothesis > yet, the choice of friends, that their # must be small, reintroduces #, calculation, into multiplicity of incalculable singularities: a certain aristocracy in arithmetic of the choice

POOF.content: via Aristotle, in economy of time, even in the instant, plenitude of enérgeia linked to #: friendship must count but resists enumeration, quantification (# isn’t forbidden but the numerous, the crowd, is) > for a finite being, test of friendship is an endurance of arithmetic
POOF.linkedContent: via Aristotle, in economy of time, even in the instant, plenitude of enérgeia linked to #: friendship must count but resists enumeration, quantification (# isn’t forbidden but the numerous, the crowd, is) > for a finite being, test of friendship is an endurance of arithmetic

POOF.content: question of # will arise again w/ grammatical choice & reading decision
POOF.linkedContent: question of # will arise again w/ grammatical choice & reading decision

POOF.content: relation btwn friendship/democracy, approbation of greatest #? deployment of countable unity, of ‘one more’ subject > the 2 presumed calculable #s of democracy (from perspective of conventional/nominalist hesitation): 1) form of decision, greatest # of people 2) possibility of this decision: birth—the equivocal double equality (isonomy founded on isogony)
POOF.linkedContent: relation btwn friendship/democracy, approbation of greatest #? deployment of countable unity, of ‘one more’ subject > the 2 presumed calculable #s of democracy (from perspective of conventional/nominalist hesitation): 1) form of decision, greatest # of people 2) possibility of this decision: birth—the equivocal double equality (isonomy founded on isogony)

POOF.content: a deconstructive thought of # and equality, power of universalization beyond State & nation, the account taken (la prise en compte) of anonymous/irreducible singularities, indifferently different [Schelling?], indifferent to particular difference, to the raging quest for identity corrupting the most indestructible desires of the idiom [democracy’s?]
POOF.linkedContent: a deconstructive thought of # and equality, power of universalization beyond State & nation, the account taken (la prise en compte) of anonymous/irreducible singularities, indifferently different [Schelling?], indifferent to particular difference, to the raging quest for identity corrupting the most indestructible desires of the idiom [democracy’s?]

A.content: greater and greater orientation toward death, for Heidegger, the incalculable nonmeasure [of truth], signifies possibility of measureless impossibility of existence
A.linkedContent: greater and greater orientation toward death, for Heidegger, the incalculable nonmeasure [of truth], signifies possibility of measureless impossibility of existence

PAS.content: Blanchot: prophets birth tongues, and feel desires they can’t support—before the immensity
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot: prophets birth tongues, and feel desires they can’t support—before the immensity

S.content: [Heidegger appeals to depth (Tiefe) positively, sees destitution (Entmachtung) of spirit/world as a flattening, where dimension has become extension & number]
S.linkedContent: [Heidegger appeals to depth (Tiefe) positively, sees destitution (Entmachtung) of spirit/world as a flattening, where dimension has become extension & number]

PPHS.content: Hegel: number is pure thought of thought’s externalization, in number sense is brought closest to thought > thoughtlessness, indifference, number remains sensuous
PPHS.linkedContent: Hegel: number is pure thought of thought’s externalization, in number sense is brought closest to thought > thoughtlessness, indifference, number remains sensuous

OS.content: Aristotle differentiates numbering # [actual #] from that which can be numbered (horse, man, time), time thus not a mathematical being
OS.linkedContent: Aristotle differentiates numbering # [actual #] from that which can be numbered (horse, man, time), time thus not a mathematical being

SP.content: on following Nietzsche outside speculum, the hermeneutic circle > immeasurable, save for the the steps of a dove (qu’au pas de colombe) [these are the steps of the Übermensch]
SP.linkedContent: on following Nietzsche outside speculum, the hermeneutic circle > immeasurable, save for the the steps of a dove (qu’au pas de colombe) [these are the steps of the Übermensch]

GSP.content: Husserl refuses to believe #s/math fall from heaven, pure Platonic idealism, but also refuses, when subjectifying math, to explain #s via “psychologism”: 1) distinguishes # from concept, psychological artifact 2) math irreducible to psychological temporality 3) designates an intentional dimension of objectivity, which no psychological genesis could institute [Frege would call this possibility a bloodless specter (blutloses Gespenst)?]
GSP.linkedContent: Husserl refuses to believe #s/math fall from heaven, pure Platonic idealism, but also refuses, when subjectifying math, to explain #s via “psychologism”: 1) distinguishes # from concept, psychological artifact 2) math irreducible to psychological temporality 3) designates an intentional dimension of objectivity, which no psychological genesis could institute [Frege would call this possibility a bloodless specter (blutloses Gespenst)?]

O.content: Hegel: math has for its Stoffe dead space & lifeless numerical unit
O.linkedContent: Hegel: math has for its Stoffe dead space & lifeless numerical unit

Gii.content: Heidegger: 2 hands clutch in haste, utilitarian violence (want #, quantity), don’t have patience of 1—the essential is not #, it’s the right time (die rechte Zeit)
Gii.linkedContent: Heidegger: 2 hands clutch in haste, utilitarian violence (want #, quantity), don’t have patience of 1—the essential is not #, it’s the right time (die rechte Zeit)

D.content: atheism in Kabbalah, belief only in # [?] > Numbers a cabal/cabala where blanks only provisionally filled in
D.linkedContent: atheism in Kabbalah, belief only in # [?] > Numbers a cabal/cabala where blanks only provisionally filled in

D.content: Numbers, as #s, have no meaning; p. 362 Numbers indecipherable, facade inscriptions
D.linkedContent: Numbers, as #s, have no meaning; p. 362 Numbers indecipherable, facade inscriptions

D.content: Numbers undecipherable because numerable and innumerable: 1) something in the # surpasses mere # or cipher 2) everything in them is not ciphered (they’re innumerable), something that’s not anything > circle of the squaring
D.linkedContent: Numbers undecipherable because numerable and innumerable: 1) something in the # surpasses mere # or cipher 2) everything in them is not ciphered (they’re innumerable), something that’s not anything > circle of the squaring

D.content: innumerable as force, blows up (or out of) all frames, & it works through it (taken into account) from the inside [Kant’s mathematical sublime?]
D.linkedContent: innumerable as force, blows up (or out of) all frames, & it works through it (taken into account) from the inside [Kant’s mathematical sublime?]

D.content: because innumerable beyond/short of what can be read by machine: excess & lack (defect)
D.linkedContent: because innumerable beyond/short of what can be read by machine: excess & lack (defect)

D.content: relation to innumerable, absence of traces—unnameable, relation to my death
D.linkedContent: relation to innumerable, absence of traces—unnameable, relation to my death

D.content: each angle of square belongs to totality of surface, but multiplies it by folding back on itself, fractures it [the surface]—leaving room for supplementary attending (d’assistance) surface
D.linkedContent: each angle of square belongs to totality of surface, but multiplies it by folding back on itself, fractures it [the surface]—leaving room for supplementary attending (d’assistance) surface

D.content: same w/ supernumerary (surnombre) (column of words): is part of the numeral and belongs (appartient) to very milieu it exceeds
D.linkedContent: same w/ supernumerary (surnombre) (column of words): is part of the numeral and belongs (appartient) to very milieu it exceeds

D.content: the unique (that which is not repeated—thus, has no unity), the inummerable, call it the present, is thus apeiron, the unlimited, the crowd, the imperfect
D.linkedContent: the unique (that which is not repeated—thus, has no unity), the inummerable, call it the present, is thus apeiron, the unlimited, the crowd, the imperfect

C.content: revenant—127 times, what of the remains is being put into figures (chiffré) in this way?
C.linkedContent: revenant—127 times, what of the remains is being put into figures (chiffré) in this way?

C.content: when there’s # in the title: corrupts the authority of the name, voice, phonetic writing
C.linkedContent: when there’s # in the title: corrupts the authority of the name, voice, phonetic writing

C.content: Pythagorean tetractys: 1+ 2 + 3 + 4 = 10 (I talked about it too much in Dissemination)
C.linkedContent: Pythagorean tetractys: 1+ 2 + 3 + 4 = 10 (I talked about it too much in Dissemination)

C.content: Derrida refers to the modesty of stopping at 127, of saying “that’s enough” > then, because (even if unconsciously) the # is prime, he finds in 127, a proud arrogance (superbe morgue)
C.linkedContent: Derrida refers to the modesty of stopping at 127, of saying “that’s enough” > then, because (even if unconsciously) the # is prime, he finds in 127, a proud arrogance (superbe morgue)

C.content: out-of-series: inhabits w/out residing, haunts, apparition of visitor is innumerable (throws arithmosophists off the trail)
C.linkedContent: out-of-series: inhabits w/out residing, haunts, apparition of visitor is innumerable (throws arithmosophists off the trail)

LI.content: [re: neologism texter] signature, événement qu’on texte: process of iteration, like surnombre [of Dissemination], marks pluralization that fractures the event, the unique, while causing it to occur (arriver)
LI.linkedContent: [re: neologism texter] signature, événement qu’on texte: process of iteration, like surnombre [of Dissemination], marks pluralization that fractures the event, the unique, while causing it to occur (arriver)

TN.content: the move from body extension to extension of psyche/thinking is incommensurable > a place (lieu) neither of objective space nor extension: place (lieu) as spacing before space
TN.linkedContent: the move from body extension to extension of psyche/thinking is incommensurable > a place (lieu) neither of objective space nor extension: place (lieu) as spacing before space

NOY.content: thought of history of Being affected by internal epochē, divides, suspends the yes: will is not identical to itself (along w/ many other things) > yes as the incalculable, the promise: [quasi-, fable of] “giving reason,” “giving an account,” the countability of the innumerable yesses
NOY.linkedContent: thought of history of Being affected by internal epochē, divides, suspends the yes: will is not identical to itself (along w/ many other things) > yes as the incalculable, the promise: [quasi-, fable of] “giving reason,” “giving an account,” the countability of the innumerable yesses

NOY.content: yes, (already but always) faithful countersignature, can’t be counted: it always sends itself off in number (il s’envoie toujours en nombre)
NOY.linkedContent: yes, (already but always) faithful countersignature, can’t be counted: it always sends itself off in number (il s’envoie toujours en nombre)

CIN.content: plurality of cinders, innumerable lurks (couvait) beneath the cinder
CIN.linkedContent: plurality of cinders, innumerable lurks (couvait) beneath the cinder

BSi.content: in Monsieur Teste, a Nietzschean kind of superman, infinitely cunning and infinitely bête solitary types: incalculable/hyperbolic arithmetic turns “who” into “what” [see pp. 200-01 in CAP(ITAL)]
BSi.linkedContent: in Monsieur Teste, a Nietzschean kind of superman, infinitely cunning and infinitely bête solitary types: incalculable/hyperbolic arithmetic turns “who” into “what” [see pp. 200-01 in CAP(ITAL)]

BSi.content: quoi as coite from quietus (silence) [who > what: silencing]turns who’s into what’s
BSi.linkedContent: quoi as coite from quietus (silence) [who > what: silencing]turns who’s into what’s

SPEC.content: detour expanding immeasurably: Umweg of 1st Chapter [re: Freud’s Beyond…] secondary to absolute/unconditional Umweg > pas de détour always leads back to death, not a question of going (aller) but of coming back (revenir)—this is the passage
SPEC.linkedContent: detour expanding immeasurably: Umweg of 1st Chapter [re: Freud’s Beyond…] secondary to absolute/unconditional Umweg > pas de détour always leads back to death, not a question of going (aller) but of coming back (revenir)—this is the passage

CHOR.content: certain dissymmetry is law of sexual difference & relation to other (Derrida says this in opposition to violence of “democratic” platitudes), dissymmetry as inordinate, excessive, goes beyond coded marks, beyond grammar & spelling of sexuality
CHOR.linkedContent: certain dissymmetry is law of sexual difference & relation to other (Derrida says this in opposition to violence of “democratic” platitudes), dissymmetry as inordinate, excessive, goes beyond coded marks, beyond grammar & spelling of sexuality

CHOR.content: in dreaming of saving the chance [of deconstructing sexuality], Derrida would like to believe in multiplicity of sexually marked voices, desire for sexuality w/out # can protect us, like a dream, from an implacable destiny that immures us (everything in life) in #2
CHOR.linkedContent: in dreaming of saving the chance [of deconstructing sexuality], Derrida would like to believe in multiplicity of sexually marked voices, desire for sexuality w/out # can protect us, like a dream, from an implacable destiny that immures us (everything in life) in #2

CHOR.content: if merciless closure [of the 2] would arrest desire at wall of opposition, there would never be but 2 > tragedy would leave this strange sense, a contingent one, that we must affirm & learn to love instead of dreaming of innumerable: but doesn’t dream prove what is dreamt of?
CHOR.linkedContent: if merciless closure [of the 2] would arrest desire at wall of opposition, there would never be but 2 > tragedy would leave this strange sense, a contingent one, that we must affirm & learn to love instead of dreaming of innumerable: but doesn’t dream prove what is dreamt of?
